mainEntity.name: How do I check my Postfix configuration?

acceptedAnswer.text: To simply check your Postfix configuration, check your files located under /etc/postfix/. Run postfix check for potential errors. And to see configuration in details, run postconf.

mainEntity.name: How do I change my Postfix configuration?

acceptedAnswer.text: To change your Postfix configuration, make changes to files stored in /etc/postfix/
